question: when did we decide to leave the eu
api_result: The decision for the United Kingdom to leave the European Union (EU) was made following a referendum held on June 23, 2016. In this referendum, 51.9% of the voters chose to leave the EU. This event is commonly referred to as "Brexit." The UK officially left the EU on January 31, 2020, and the transition period ended on December 31, 2020.
